name: Hotel Alpenblick Ferienschlössl
description:
Hotel Alpenblick – “My holiday castle in Tyrol” 
The most precious thing in life is time – time to live, time for yourself, time for beautiful moments – TIME AT THE ALPENBLICK. MAKE 

YOUR DREAMS COME TRUE – dreams of relaxation, of moments all to yourself. Replenish your soul. The wide, gentle valley, the lush green meadows, the majestic peaks – a dream for friends of the mountains. The fresh, healthy climate, crystal-clear spring water, pure air. 

Tyrolean hospitality… 
... and a warm atmosphere have set our vacation resort apart for many years. We strive to be a SECOND HOME for our guests, pampering them in every way imaginable. We are also keeping up with the wellness trend by continuously expanding our programs in this field. 

We are looking forward to your visit! 
Erich and Romana Eder & Family
